title: Justin Martin & His Wife Are Having TWINS!
description:
Uncle Si's mind is blown when Martin reveals that he and his wife have TWO babies on the way. Martin is terrified, ecstatic, and looking to Godwin for dad joke training, and John-David is already lining up babysitters. Si reminisces about the first time his wife found out she was pregnant. And the boys offer up advice to a dad who's torn between working and going to church on Sundays.
-
